text: Pamela Sharples, Baroness Sharples (; 11 February 1923 â€“ 19 May 2022) was a British life peer of the Conservative Party. She was honored with peerage in 1973 after the assassination of her husband, Sir Richard Sharples, Governor of Bermuda. She was on the House of Lords until 2017. Sharples died on 19 May 2022 at the age of 99. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2022 deaths Category:British businesspeople
title: Pamela Sharples, Baroness Sharples
